name: InterviewMate

offers.description: 10 sessions for $4. Use code LAUNCH50 for 50% off.

description: Real-time cheating for any interview. Job interviews, PhD defenses, visa interviews, school admissions - get AI-powered answers in under 2 seconds. Works on Zoom, Teams, Google Meet.
features: Real-time speech-to-text with Deepgram Flux (<500ms latency)
AI-powered answer generation with Claude 3.5 Sonnet
Personalized responses based on your uploaded context
Works during live video calls on Zoom, Teams, Google Meet
Supports job interviews, PhD defenses, visa interviews, school admissions
RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) for personalized answers
releaseNotes: Real-time interview coaching with sub-second latency. Deepgram Flux integration for faster transcription. Async architecture eliminates timeout issues.
keywords: interview assistant, real-time AI, job interview help, PhD defense assistant, visa interview prep, school admission interview, Zoom interview tool, video interview assistant, live interview help
